nodes.text: Used in the offhand, the Echani vibroblades possessed not only the cortosis weave that made them capable of blocking a lightsaber strike but, on occasions, were also super cooled, to keep them in alignment, which made strikes by these weapons icy to the touch.
Revan, an amnesiac Sith Lord, gained this sword when he helped an injured Wookiee avenge his comrades' deaths at the hands of Mandalorian raiders.
